page.title: 05Spinning,Dyeing,Weaving
page.content: THERE IS A MOTHER WITH 3 SONS IN THE VILLAGE OF ACHNAMARA WHOSE HOBBIES ARE SPINNING,DYEING AND WEAVING.SHE TAUGHT HER SELF TO SPIN.HER BEECH WOOD HEBRIDEAN SPINNING WHEEL CAME FROM LEWIS.THEY ARE PRICED FROM Â£70_400.SHE BUYS FLEECES FROM LOCAL FARMERS.IT IS EASIER TO SPIN BEFORE WASHING.A LAZY KATE IS USED TO PLY THE WOOL WHICH IS THEN PUT ROUND A NIDDY NODDY TO MAKE A HANK.SHE THEN USES IT TO DYE,WEAVE OR KNIT.SUBTLE COLOURS OF WILD PLANTS AND BERRIES ARE USED TO DYE.SOME DYESTUFFS EG.LICHEN AND WALNUTS ARE USED DIRECTLY.OTHERS REQUIRE THE WOOL TO BE PREPARED TO ABSORB THE COLOUR.STAGHORN LICHEN BOILED GIVES PINK,ADD AMMONIA AND IT IS MULBERRY. OLD MAN'S BEARD LICHEN GIVES GOLD-YELLOW.SHE IS WEAVING A WALL HANGING,HAS SPUN AND KNITTED 2 JUMPERS AND 10 PAIRS OF SOCKS.
